verses.name: Acts 11:27
verses.text: And in these days came prophets from Jerusalem unto Antioch.

verses.name: Acts 11:28
verses.text: And there stood up one of them named Agabus, and signified by the spirit that there should be great dearth throughout all the world: which came to pass in the days of Claudius Cesar.

verses.name: Acts 11:29
verses.text: Then the disciples, every man according to his ability, determined to send relief unto the brethren which dwelt in Judea:

verses.name: Acts 11:30
verses.text: Which also they did, and sent it to the elders by the hands of Barnabas and Saul.
